body_html: It's a problem with pycuda. It creates its own CUDA contexts and doesn't let you run anything from other threads. The error you're getting is because the backward is executed in a context of an autograd engine thread. We won't be fixing this. If you want to compile CUDA code at runtime I'd recommend using cupy (here's an example).

body: It's a problem with pycuda. It creates its own CUDA contexts and doesn't let you run anything from other threads. The error you're getting is because the `backward` is executed in a context of an autograd engine thread. We won't be fixing this. If you want to compile CUDA code at runtime I'd recommend using cupy ([here's an example](https://gist.github.com/apaszke/7106bf48456ab4296bce4b73b8967b9c)).
